GSD.description:
memstick/mspro_block: fix handling of read-only devices

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 6a0725b9d78ff6efdc95a37e4f05072e79c63918. For more details please see the references link.
